subtitle: A delicious vegetarian dish - beautiful to look at and even better to eat - hot or cold! Double the portions for a main meal.

method.text: Preheat oven to 200°C. With a knife, score aubergine flesh with criss-cross diagonal lines, keeping outer case intact. Sprinkle lemon juice onto cut surface and place on baking tray.
Bake for 20 min or until flesh is tender. Season aubergines.
Fluff up couscous and mix with the sun-dried tomatoes, olives, apricots, mint, nuts and salad onions.
Carefully, scoop out aubergine flesh. Chop flesh into pieces and mix with the couscous.
Pile couscous stuffing back into aubergines and return to oven for 15-20 min to serve warm - or put into fridge to chill.
Mix dressing ingredients together and season. Serve with the aubergines.

title: Couscous aubergine
